projects.name: Cooperate, Reach Out, Integrate Services (CRIS)
projects.summary: CRIS is a European Commission project, focused on strengthening integrated service delivery for vulnerable groups to support their inclusion in the labour market and society. I am a working on this project as member of a national panel of experts from the Slovak Academy of Science and will compose a policy analysis aimed at improving the current labor policy landscape.

projects.name: Basic Income Guaranee for Marginalized Groups (EU BIG)
projects.summary: EU BIG is a pilot project by the European Commission to improve the delivery of social benefits to marginalized Roma households in Romania, Bulgaria, and Slovakia. I manage the evaluation methodology of this project across the three countries on behalf of the World Bank team. I also serve as the country coordinator for Slovakia.
